arguments.value: owner cannot buy their own ticke

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title NftTicketEscrow
 @dev Simple NFT-like ticketing and resale system with escrow-style transfers.
      Educational example suitable for Remix and testnets (Sepolia, etc).
 Features:
  - Event creation by organizers
  - Primary ticket purchases
  - Secondary resale marketplace with on-contract escrow handling
  - Ticket validation (mark as used)
  - Event cancellation and ticket refunds
 Notes:
  - Tickets are simple structs (not an ERC-721 implementation) to keep code compact.
  - All external calls that transfer ETH use the checks-effects-interactions pattern.
@notice Set platform fee in basis points (10000 = 100%). Only admin.
@notice Create an event. Organizer becomes msg.sender.
@notice Buy a primary ticket directly from the organizer.
@notice List an owned ticket for resale at a chosen price.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "owner cannot buy their own ticket"

arguments.value: owner cannot buy their own ticket

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "owner cannot buy their own ticket"

documentation.text: @notice Buy a ticket listed for resale. Contract handles escrow and platform fee.

@notice Validate (use) a ticket. This marks it as Used.
 @dev For simplicity callable by anyone; in production restrict to gate staff or organizer.
@notice Cancel an event. Only organizer may call.
@notice Helper to check if an event exists

devdoc.details: Simple NFT-like ticketing and resale system with escrow-style transfers.      Educational example suitable for Remix and testnets (Sepolia, etc). Features:  - Event creation by organizers  - Primary ticket purchases  - Secondary resale marketplace with on-contract escrow handling  - Ticket validation (mark as used)  - Event cancellation and ticket refunds Notes:  - Tickets are simple structs (not an ERC-721 implementation) to keep code compact.  - All external calls that transfer ETH use the checks-effects-interactions pattern.

refundTicket(uint256).details: Refunds the original primary ticket price. If ticket was purchased via resale,      we still refund the original event ticket price for simplicity.

validateTicket(uint256).details: For simplicity callable by anyone; in production restrict to gate staff or organizer.

devdoc.title: NftTicketEscrow

buyPrimaryTicket(uint256).notice: Buy a primary ticket directly from the organizer.

buyResaleTicket(uint256).notice: Buy a ticket listed for resale. Contract handles escrow and platform fee.

cancelEvent(uint256).notice: Cancel an event. Only organizer may call.

createEvent(string,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Create an event. Organizer becomes msg.sender.

eventExists(uint256).notice: Helper to check if an event exists

listTicketForResale(uint256,uint256).notice: List an owned ticket for resale at a chosen price.

refundTicket(uint256).notice: Refund a ticket after its event has been cancelled.

setPlatformFeeBps(uint256).notice: Set platform fee in basis points (10000 = 100%). Only admin.

validateTicket(uint256).notice: Validate (use) a ticket. This marks it as Used.
